title: From Ransomware To Blackmail, With Assaf Dahan
description: Hackers keep modifying and improving their methods of operations. Assaf Dahan, Sr. Director and Head of Threat Research at Cybereason, tells us about the recent shift to Blackmail - as a way to pressure Ransomware victims to pay the ransom.
content:encoded:
Hackers keep modifying and improving their methods of operations. Assaf Dahan, Sr. Director and Head of Threat Research at Cybereason, tells us about the recent shift to Blackmail – as a way to pressure Ransomware victims to pay the ransom.

Assaf’s Webinar will take place on July 14th, 2020. Register to the webinar at https://www.cybereason.com/ransomware.
itunes:subtitle: Hackers keep modifying and improving their methods of operations. Assaf Dahan, Sr. Director and Head of Threat Research at Cybereason, tells us about the recent shift to Blackmail - as a way to pressure Ransomware victims to pay the ransom.
